meanings.definition: A person who shows respect or admiration for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She is a true respecter of nature, always picking up litter on her hikes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is a respected respecter of knowledge, always encouraging her students to learn.
meanings.sent3: The respecter of time, the punctual student, was never late to class.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, the respecter of talent can see the beauty in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The respecter of elders, the young boy always listened attentively to his grandmother's stories.

meanings.definition: An attribute or quality that commands respect or admiration.
meanings.sent1: Honesty is a key respecter in any relationship, building trust and loyalty.
meanings.sent2: Courage is a respecter that inspires others to face their fears.
meanings.sent3: The respecter of bravery, the little dog barked at the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: Kindness, a true respecter, can brighten even the darkest of days.
meanings.sent5: Integrity, a respecter of character, shines through in every action taken.
